text: Literally just got a delivery. Took over and hour, food is super cold, no sauce for bread sticks and driver didn't have change. Horrible service never order from this location!

name: shaella gore
text: I called to place delivery and because they were busy they refused my service..I called back 5 times and no one answered. NEVER ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION!!!!!

text: They won't answer the phone but when they do they put you on hold and never pick it up.

text: I ❤ the salted pretzel stuffed crust pizza!!
